scripts.generate-html: fragments src/en dist/en && fragments src/es dist/es
scripts.copy-resource: cp -R src/assets dist && cp -R src/js dist && cp src/redirect*.html dist && cp src/sitemap.xml dist
scripts.build: npm run clear-dist && npm run generate-html && npm run copy-resource
scripts.deploy-dry: aws s3 sync dist s3://lizneira.com --dryrun --profile dusan
scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws s3 sync dist s3://lizneira.com --profile dusan
scripts.cleanup: aws s3 sync dist s3://lizneira.com --delete --profile dusan
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run deploy
